comments.body: Any way to limit the line width here? I'd hate to make sure every line falls below 80 on my own, would be nice if that was automated by a formatter
Following CE2, I sort of tried to cover the class from a high-level, leaving examples and more explanation to the site documentation. maybe there should be less detail here though

> Any way to limit the line width here? I'd hate to make sure every line falls below 80 on my own, would be nice if that was automated by a formatter

Not automatically. I usually add a visual ruler guideline in the editor and make sure to follow it manually.
